participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and sociable, enjoys sharing stories about his life and experiences.
participant_1.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i move south during the winter. i have been retired for a years.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and reflective, she loves to help others and often reminisces about the past.
participant_2.background: i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.
